summary: A very good cop tries to catch a very insidious and extremely clever serial car thief. The bitter irony is that the thief is not very clever, absolutely not insidious, and moreover - a virtuous person and his friend.
cast: Innokentiy Smoktunovskiy|Oleg Efremov|Lyubov Dobrzhanskaya|Anatoliy Papanov|Olga Aroseva|Andrey Mironov|Georgi Zhzhyonov|Evgeniy Evstigneev|Donatas Banionis|Lyubov Sokolova|Vyacheslav Nevinnyy|Gotlib Roninson|Galina Volchek|Tatyana Gavrilova|Antonina Maksimova|Sergey Kulagin|Yakov Lents|Viktoriya Radunskaya|Boris Runge|Emiliya Milton|Yuriy Yakovlev
title: Beregis avtomobilya
